sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
    CusID,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(CusName, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS CusName,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(cusAddress, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), ''), '"', '') AS cusAddress,
    ISISChannelID,
    OwnerID,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(OwnerName, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS OwnerName,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(INN, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS INN,
    TradeShopID,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(StoreTypeName, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS StoreTypeName,
    Phone,
    CreateDate,
    UpdateDate
from [dbo].[@{pipeline().parameters.src_customer_table}]

select
    CusID,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(CusName, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS CusName,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(cusAddress, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), ''), '"', '') AS cusAddress,
    ISISChannelID,
    OwnerID,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(OwnerName, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS OwnerName,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(INN, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS INN,
    TradeShopID,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(StoreTypeName, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS StoreTypeName,
    Phone,
    CreateDate,
    UpdateDate
from [dbo].[@{pipeline().parameters.src_customer_table}]

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    CUSID,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(CusName, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS CusName,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CusAddress, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), ''), '"', '') AS CusAddress,
    OwnerID,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(OwnerName, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS OwnerName,
    GoldenFlag,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(StoreType, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS StoreType,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(INN, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS INN,
    Phone,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(BuyingPower, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS BuyingPower,
    LocationSegment,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(Channel, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS Channel,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(Image, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS Image,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(SubChannel, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS SubChannel,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(SalesTeam, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS SalesTeam,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(DeliveryArea, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS DeliveryArea,
    ChannelID,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(District, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS District,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(Khoroo, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '') AS Khoroo,
    CreateDate,
    UpdateDate
FROM BigOneFullCustomers_CC_New
